threads.title: 820-3437-b not coming up 3seconds fan spin
threads.message:
voltage reading

PPVRTC_G3H-3v
PP5v S4RS3-0v
PP5V_s0.     -0v
PP3v3_s5-3v3
PP3v3_s0 -0v
The fan spins for 3 second and stop

threads.title: 820-3437-b not coming up 3seconds fan spin
threads.message:

----------
 PP5vS5.         -5v"
How is possible to get 5V from 3.6V on this board???
Please post accurate information.
Check PPBUS_G3H voltage when fan spins.

Any fault history available?
